A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was the worst star wars movie so far!  Whoever is responsible for writing this crap should be fired because they have ruined Star Wars.  Plot full of holes with whole scenes that are unnecessary and add nothing to the story.  Luke's character has been emasculated along with all the other male characters as a helpless/hopeless old Jedi.  They could've at least made him believable in his role by being more like old Ben Kenobi.  I'm just so disappointed and sad that my childhood movie has taken this turn down the toilet.
